me.normanmaurer.niosmtp
Interface SMTPResponseCallback

All Known Subinterfaces:
SMTPMultiResponseCallback
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAuthResponseCallback, AbstractPipelineResponseCallback, AbstractResponseCallback, AuthLoginResponseCallback, AuthPlainResponseCallback, DataResponseCallback, EhloResponseCallback, LMTPPostDataResponseCallback, LMTPWelcomeResponseCallback, MailResponseCallback, PostDataResponseCallback, RcptResponseCallback, SMTPPipelingingResponseCallback, StartTlsResponseCallback, WelcomeResponseCallback
public interface SMTPResponseCallback

Callback which will get executed in an async manner. Every SMTPResponseCallback should be stateless to make sure you don't run in threading issues. If you need to pass a value to it you should store it in SMTPClientSession.getAttributes()

Author:
Norman Maurer

          SMTPResponseCallback which just do nothing

void onException(SMTPClientSession session,
